content: What is the name of the famous English playwright who also played a role in his own play 'Hamlet'?

Ah, you're referring to William Shakespeare, the renowned English playwright and actor. He indeed had a role in his play 'Hamlet,' although specific details about his performance are scarce. Shakespeare was not only a master playwright but also an accomplished actor of his time. His contributions to literature and theater have had a profound and lasting impact on English language and culture.
